name: Telerik Academy
body:
## Homeworks and projects
### Team Projects * [Table tennis - C# Fundamentals] (https://github.com/Anastasoff/Telerik-Academy/tree/master/TeamProjects/01.TableTennis) * [Football Stats - C# OOP] (https://github.com/Anastasoff/Telerik-Academy/tree/master/TeamProjects/02.FootballStats) * [Popcorn - JavaScript UI] (https://github.com/nzhul/Popcorn-Kintaro) * [Minesweeper - High-Quality Code] (https://github.com/Anastasoff/Minesweeper) * [AndOneConstructions - Databases] (https://github.com/diana-stancheva/TeamLich) * [DefinitelyNotGallery - Web Services] (https://github.com/WebServicesAndCloudTeamCurrant) * [Drasti.bg - Node.js] (https://github.com/Nodejs-Team-Hestia) ### Personal Projects * [Your Workout - ASP.NET MVC] (https://github.com/Anastasoff/Your-Workout)
### Programming * [C# Fundamentals] (https://github.com/Anastasoff/Telerik-Academy/tree/master/Programming/CSharp-Fundamentals) * [C# OOP] (https://github.com/Anastasoff/Telerik-Academy/tree/master/Programming/CSharp-OOP) * [High-Quality Code] (https://github.com/Anastasoff/Telerik-Academy/tree/master/Programming/High-Quality-Code) * [Data Structures and Algorithms] (https://github.com/Anastasoff/Telerik-Academy/tree/master/Programming/Data-Structures-and-Algorithms) ### Web Design and UI Technologies * [HTML] (https://github.com/Anastasoff/Telerik-Academy/tree/master/Web/HTML) * [CSS] (https://github.com/Anastasoff/Telerik-Academy/tree/master/Web/CSS) * [JavaScript Fundamentals] (https://github.com/Anastasoff/Telerik-Academy/tree/master/Web/JavaScript-Fundamentals) * [JavaScript DOM and UI] (https://github.com/Anastasoff/Telerik-Academy/tree/master/Web/JavaScript-DOM-And-UI) * [JavaScript OOP] (https://github.com/Anastasoff/Telerik-Academy/tree/master/Web/JavaScript-OOP) * [JavaScript Applications] (https://github.com/Anastasoff/Telerik-Academy/tree/master/Web/JavaScript-Apps) * [AngularJS] (https://github.com/Anastasoff/Telerik-Academy/tree/master/Web/AngularJS) ### Software Technologies * [Databases] (https://github.com/Anastasoff/Telerik-Academy/tree/master/Software-Technologies/Databases) * [Web Services] (https://github.com/Anastasoff/Telerik-Academy/tree/master/Software-Technologies/Web-Services) * [Node.js] (https://github.com/Anastasoff/Telerik-Academy/tree/master/Software-Technologies/Node.js) * [ASP.NET Web Forms] (https://github.com/Anastasoff/Telerik-Academy/tree/master/Software-Technologies/ASP.NET-Web-Forms) * [ASP.NET MVC] (https://github.com/Anastasoff/Telerik-Academy/tree/master/Software-Technologies/ASP.NET-MVC/Exam)
